Description:
Attention First home buyers & Investors!
Nestled on a generous 650m2 (approx) block in a near central location of Cranbourne, this property offers you a great opportunity to make an important investment in your future. It's only a short walk from local schools, shops and 5 minutes drive to Cranbourne station & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
This well-built brick house leaves investors or owners to do nothing to make it your home.
- 3 Bedrooms, 1Bath.
- Big Lounge.
- Separate Dining.
- Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- Large storage shed and Big Backyard.
- Outdoor Area.
- Security Window Rolling Shutters.
- Security Alarm & NBN.
- Separately built generous size kids day care / entertaining area.
Come one come all, this beauty will not last past the first open for inspection, or you call book an immediate inspection by calling Vikram Dhankhar on 0430392918.

Description:
758sqm block, yes 758sqm
The Fantastic location and large block that this property offers are just a couple of advantages that this home entails. All the effort has been put in for you!
- HUGE 758 sqm block.
- 3 generous sized bedrooms with BIR's.
- 2 separate living areas.
- Updated kitchen flowing through into the living area.
- Massive yard with enclosed undercover outdoor area.
- Solar panels
Extras in this home include, double car accommodation in addition to plenty space for baots, caravans & other vehicles. Heating & cooling, downlights, etc.
Within a short drive you will reach the conveniences of the freeways, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, schools and plenty of reserves.
First home buyers, investors – your opportunity awaits you! Call us today to view this superb home as it undoubtedly will not last long.
Please note that one of the gas heaters is not functional.
Please note that the spa will not be staying.

Description:
A Blend Of A Balinese Lifestyle
Sitting on a 647m2 approx block you will be impressed by this totally renovated 3 bedroom home. Its trendy & modern with a definite blend of Bali. All bedrooms have built in robes with a renovated modern bathroom. Spacious light and bright living room and theatre room. The projector and its screen stays, plus the bar in this package along with the secuirty camera's. Ducted heating and air conditioning. A new kitchen with a stainless steel 900mm stove, dishwasher and walk in pantry.
A trendy and colourful enclosed sunroom with gas log fire, bamboo screening that looks really good. Step outside and be amongst the delightful tropical gardens, spacious pergola, it's perfect for the summer BBQ's coming up.
Yummy fruit trees that include apple, cherry, plum, apricot, nectarine and orange. Double garage and backyard access, close to all amenities Cranbourne has to offer.
It's a wonderful package we have for you and be quick. Please call Karen on 0405 145 864. You won't be disappointed.
Property Code: 1510

Description:
Entertainers paradise on 595m2 land
Family living doesn't get more fun, more central or more entertaining than this!
Just minutes' walk to the shopping centre and primary school, this stunning four bedroom, two bathroom home offers exceptional indoor & outdoor living across an expansive single-level block of land on 595m2.
Each of the bedrooms is generous in size, the peaceful master boasts a walk-in robe and ensuite, whilst wrapping up a truly tempting & spacious kitchen, dining area, theatre room, double garage plus another carport suitable for car/caravan/trailer
To seal the deal is this enormous outdoor area which is undercover, fully decked, zoned cleverly and offers some of the features of outdoor area as below.
- Large bar with stainless bench
- Outdoor dining area facing mirrored water feature
- Separate sitting area facing rear roller door to garage
- Massive wood fire pizza oven
- Speakers throughout every corner of the pergola, fans & TV bracket
- Overlooks large backyard
Some of the other great features of the property are listed below:
- Great sized kitchen with 900mm s/steel appliances & dishwasher
- Theatre room equipped with speaker system & shutters & ceiling fan
- French doors from dinning to outdoor area
- Central bathroom and separate toilet.
- Ensuite bathroom offers wall to wall shower
- Sydney redgum flooring though out the house except rooms & wet areas
- Double remote garage with internal and rear access
- Ducted heating system & Cooling System & alarm system
- Beautifully landscaped gardens
- 3.6kw solar panels & solar hot water system
- Massive driveway
Situated in the ever popular "Carlisle Park Estate" only 40 minutes to Melbourne CBD with an easy access to Western Port Freeway and Monash Freeway.
Less than 2 minutes to:
- Springhill Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School
- Medical Centre & 24 hours Gym
- Springhill drive Early Learning & Kinder
- Carlisle Park (Park)
- Carlisle Park Vikings Cricket Club
- Bus Stop # 841
Less than 5 minutes to:
- Courtenay Gardens Primary School
- Thompson Road Clinic
- Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Homemaker Center
- Casey Central Shopping Centre
- Merinda Park railway station
This warmest and friendliest family home is surely going to impress and suit all types of buyers with its great size and location, so don't wait contact Naval or Irene now to discuss further.
Insights: 10 Forest Oak Court, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 4 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
RANGEBANK ESTATE: If you believe in the age old theory that a top location equals great real estate then this is an absolute must to inspect. Sensational position within walking distance to Rangebank Primary School and Kindergarten with Lawson Pool Recreation Reserve literally across the road! Within close proximity to Merinda Park train station and Thompson Road, direct to all of the shopping facilities on offer at Marriott Waters and the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre!
The property itself has been well maintained over the years and comprises 3 true robed bedrooms. The spacious master features a ceiling fan, semi-ensuite and a walk through robe, whilst bedrooms 2 and 3 are in close proximity to the family bathroom with separate bath/shower facilities!
The central kitchen is complete with ample cupboard/bench space, a 4-burner hot plate plus a wall oven. All of this and a whole lot more overlooking the tiled family/meals zone with convenient external sliding door access.
Upon entry you will be greeted by a spacious family area with ceiling fan, S/S air-conditioning and gas heating. Outdoor entertaining is taken care of with the oversized paved pergola with downlights and brush wire fencing, which further increases the privacy levels. This is the perfect place for entertaining with family and friends during the warmer months!
Step outside and be embraced by a traditional, old school court location providing the ideal environment for a hit of cricket with the local neighbours.
There is a spacious front yard with low maintenance landscaping, a private porch entry plus a lengthy driveway leading to the oversized carport. Beyond the secure gating, allowing safe parking for low clearing boats, caravans and trailers, there is a roomy free standing 4 car garage with side walkway access, ample storage space plus power and lighting facilities. With plenty of room for project cars this area can also double up as the perfect "man cave"!
The large block of app. 650m2 has a high clearing tree setting, established gardens, rear enclosure great for those with pets and plenty of room for the kids to run amuck! Added bonuses include the covered BBQ area, under eve downlights and the roller shutters, perfect for the security conscious and night shift workers!
Don't forget the plans and permits for a 2nd dwelling at the rear. The double storey design consists of a functional floorplan featuring a generous downstairs kitchen overlooking the adjoining meals area and family room. There is also a full laundry, a powder room and a large master with a walk in robe and a full ensuite. Upstairs you will be greeted by a 2nd robed bedroom with access to a bonus family bathroom and study nook! Not to mention the single carport and the low maintenance outdoor open spaces!
Ideally suited to developers looking to sub-divide and construct ASAP and investors keen to take advantage of the income being generated by the current tenants! Houses offering this much potential in tightly held pockets such as Rangebank sell like hot cakes so don't delay.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!*
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

- 3 Big Bedrooms all of great size and built in robes

- Wall A/C and ceiling fans
- Side Access for boats/trailers/caravans

This well-loved property is minutes drive to Cranbourne train station and close proximity to local shops, bus services and schools. This is one not to overlook!

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
RANGEBANK ESTATE, CRANBOURNE: As a first home buyer looking to cement themselves in the market, or an investor with an eye on growth and market appeal, you really cannot go past this gem! In perfectly maintained original condition, 36 Marylyn Place is great as it stands and still offers the opportunity to further update whilst adding style, appeal and significant value.
Nestled within an established location with your own private gate leading to Lawson Poole Reserve, the property itself is fronted by a mature front hedge for added privacy and features a classic brick facade and covered front porch.
Step inside and be greeted by a large lounge room with air-conditioning and a Coonara style wood heater. There's also a dining room that can easily double up as an open study, a brand new kitchen with stone benches and an upright oven/stove plus an adjoining meals/family area with a bonus 2nd air conditioner.
There are 3 robed bedrooms, including the master that has its own walk in wardrobe and an ensuite, whilst the pristine family bathroom has a separate toilet. Don't forget the comprehensive solar electricity array that helps to keep the bills in check (please refer to the following link for extra information https://www.skyenergysystems.com.au/solarbatteries), ideal in a time where living expenses just seem to keep escalating. The security conscious will also feel right at home with the 5 megapixel cameras (x 7) that connect to the internet allowing for vision 24/7.
Outside you will find a generous backyard and a spacious pergola perfect for Summer time entertaining with family and friends. Not to mention the ample car accommodation between the long concreted driveway and the full sized 4 car garage privately set at the rear of the property.
With an overall land size of app. 660m2 and strong evidence of sub-division in the area, those looking to land bank for future development (S.T.C.A.) should place this one high on their shopping list!
If you believe in the age old theory that a top location equals great real estate then this is an absolute must to inspect! Sensational position within walking distance to Rangebank Primary School and Kindergarten. Close proximity to buses, Merinda Park train station and Thompson Road, which provides direct access to all of the shopping facilities on offer at the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre!
With turnover in this popular estate at an all-time low don't muck around or else you will miss out!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS)!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

If you are seeking a great location, then this is the one. Currently leased to a long term tenant until October 2018, this is a sound investment opportunity in central Cranbourne, contact Daniel today!

Description:
Under Offer
Here lies an opportunity to purchase an immaculate property in an established & highly sought after area. This original yet well maintained home is situated within walking distance to facilities, such as Cranbourne Centro, Schools and Public Transport. Bursting with potential, this property would suit those looking for a family home, the astute investors who are seeking to add value to their portfolio or anyone looking to simply renovate the current dwelling to add their own touch.
Situated in the heart of the home is a generous sized timber kitchen which overlooks the established greenery of the outdoor entertaining area, with gas appliances, dishwasher and plenty of bench & cupboard space, it has it all covered. To top it off the home also boasts and open plan family/meals area with gas heating, cooling, master with split system cooling & walk-in robe, a further two bedrooms and main family bathroom with huge corner bath. Outdoors is a double remote control garage with rear access, garden shed and easy to maintain garden.
Other Possibilities for this prime position is the prospect of converting it to a consulting suite for medical or orthodontic purposes (STCA).
Being conveniently situated on a corner block of approximately 579sqm of land, this well maintained family home consists of endless opportunities & provides the perfect combination for any resident.

Santa has come early with this one
O'Brien Real Estate has an exciting opportunity for the first home buyer, someone wanting to downsize or the property investor wanting to expand their property portfolio. Introducing this neat and tidy home that sits on a spacious 671m2 block of land and perfectly located within walking distance to Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre, Thompson Road Medical Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre, public transport and local schools. Featuring:
- Three spacious Bedrooms, all with double built in robes.
- Two living areas, including a large lounge room with wood heater and a separate kitchen family meals area.

This wonderful property also comes with split system cooling, a large shed to the backyard and low maintenance gardens. This property is a real little gem and won't last long! To find out more contact Fabian from O'Brien Real Estate today!

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Stop searching, this is the one for you! This family home is a must to see and represents huge potential in a prime location only minutes to Cranbourne train station, bus stops, primary schools, childcare centres and the recently updated and extended Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
Situated on a substantial block of 629sqm (approx.) it caters to all, whether you are a growing family or an astute investor! The property features three generous bedrooms all with built in robes, master with ensuite, central family bathroom, spacious modern kitchen, large lounge and separate dining.
Stepping outside you with find a large garage/workshop and space aplenty for future developments (STCA) or simply for the kids to play. Parking will never be a problem with a double carport followed and an extra tandem carport.
A great opportunity in the premium location of central Cranbourne, it is currently leased to a long term tenant.
Inspection of this property, I can assure you will not disappoint!
Thinking of selling? Call us today; Boronia office on 9761 2277, Wantirna office on 9800 1225, Rowville office on 9755 6666 or Bayswater office on 9720 3030.

CALL JOHN TODAY.

Description:
Entry level buying at its best
Situated within a central location on a healthy 656m2 allotment this impressive entry level home would be perfect for 1st home buyers and investors looking to start their property portfolio!
Comprising of 3 bedrooms, master with built in robes, electric heating and cooling, fresh paint and flooring, light filled formal lounge and separate dining area plus a functional galley kitchen.
The exterior offers an over sized single carport, rear access and large rear yard decorated by low maintenance landscaping!
Located in close proximity to local shops, schools and public transport this truly exciting property needs to be at the top of your short list, call now for more information.

Description:
Perfect for Investors, Downsizers & FHB's!
(217420) Located in one of the most sought after areas of Cranbourne and right in the heart of town is this spacious 3 bedroom home.
Only a very short walk from amenities such as schools, shops, parks, doctors and to public transport depot, this home has a lot to offer and would bring a great return for investors and or would be a great start for FHB's.
Property Features;
- 3 bedroom brick veneer home.
- Master with full ensuite & WIR.
- Bedrooms 2 & 3 with BIR's.
- Open plan kitchen/dining & family room area.
- Private court.
- Ducted Heating/cooling & Vacuum.
An inspection is a must, so be quick and call today as this one will not last long!
For all enquiries & inspections please call Jason Brown Direct.

Description:
Rare Opportunity! In Cranbourne's Finest Estate!
Introducing 6 Elgin Mews Cranbourne! Located in Brookland Greens, no doubt one of the most sought after estate of Cranbourne, is this fantastic family residence, with no body corporate!
Ideal for the first home buyer, young family or investor, the property offers a very functional and practical floor plan. On the ground level, the hostess kitchen provides an abundance of both bench and cupboard space with quality stainless steel appliances including dish washer, large microwave and fridge provision as well as a large pantry overlooking the tiled family dining area.
The separate living zone is generous in size and ensures enough room for everyone to unwind and guests have convenient access to the bonus study & powder room.
Upstairs offers 3 generous bedrooms, the master is particularly spacious and boasts a full ensuite with spa bath and walk in robe, whilst the other bedrooms enjoy an uninterrupted view of the park, contain built in robes and are centred around the second bathroom.
Other internal extras you will soon become accustomed to include; ducted heating, ducted vacuum, under stairs storage space, high ceilings and internal access from the garage. External extras include; low maintenance front and rear gardens, concreted backyard ideal for entertaining complete.
This feature packed home sits opposite park land and is sensationally located in one of Cranbourne's most prestigious estates surrounded by quality established homes. With the Ranfurlie, Greg Norman and Amstel golf courses all close by the estate also includes a childcare centre, open parkland with a BMX track, exercise stations, walking tracks, playgrounds and sporting facilities. Local schools and shops are only minutes away!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - **PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS**!

- 3 bedrooms - master with 2 way bathroom and walk-in robe
- Entertainers kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances,40mm
stone benches with glass splashback.
- A large family/meals area.
- Nicely landscaped front & back garden with plenty of space.
- Remote controlled Double garage with internal access.
- Security alarm & cameras.
- Split air conditioning & ducted heating.
Conveniently situated in the best pocket of Cranbourne â?? literally 2 mins drive to hunt club shopping precinct, quality schools, parks, shops and public transport. To inspect and appreciate, call Vikram today on 0430392918.
